Carolina Reaper***

South Carolina’s own reaper pepper-flavored wing. Hottest in South Carolina. ***Waiver required***

South Carolina Gold

Golden BBQ, sweet & tangy

Teriyaki, Hot Teriyaki

Soy, sake, mirin glaze make it hot

TX Mesquite BBQ

Smoky & sweet with a kick

OG Buffalo

Medium or hot. traditional anchor bar style

Buffalo Garlic Romano

The best of two worlds

MD Old Bay Style

Smoky, salty, & peppery with hints of mustard, turmeric

Louisiana Cajun

Rustic blend of paprika, cayenne & garlic

Ranch

Dry-rubbed and delicious

KY Bourbon

Sweet smoky & rich

Garlic Romano

“Tons” of garlic mixed with buttery & salty pecorino romano

Nashville Hot

Fiery heat with a touch of sweet

Classic Lemon Pepper

Zesty & sweet with just the right amount of sour

Sweet Thai Chili

Starts off sweet, finishes with a kick

Add Ons
Add to Split Flavors for 12 and Above + 2.00 $ Extra Ranch or Blue Cheese + 0.50 $ 
Our BCBG burgers are a 1/4 lb. Custom blend of brisket, chuck, and short rib, delivering an exceptionally juicy and flavorful burger experience
Single 11.95 | Double 17.95 | Triple 21.95 | Add Carolina Queso Dip +4.95

Burgers & Cheesesteaks

20 Year Griddle Double Patty Melt

Double burger patty, caramelized onions, 1000 Island, American cheese, griddled butter bread
18.95 $ 
NoMtP Quarter Pounder

Crispy fried or char-grilled American cheese, red onion, pickles, Duke’s Mayo
14.95 $ 
Coastal Carolina Cowboy Burger

Sweet & sassy BBQ, fried onion ring crispy bacon, grilled onions, pepper Jack cheese
15.95 $ 
Hot Honey & Bacon Cheeseburger

Double patty, crispy bacon, hot honey, caramelized onions pepper Jack cheese
18.95 $ 
Lowcountry Juicy Lucy

Double patty stuffed with housemade pimento cheese
18.95 $ 
The Belly Buster Burger

Double burger patty, fried egg, caramelized onions, crispy bacon American cheese lettuce, tomato, griddled butter bread
19.95 $

Grilled onions, American cheese
17.95 $

Shaved ribeye, roasted bell peppers, grilled onions, American cheese
16.95 $ 
Buffalo & Blue Cheesesteak

Tangy buffalo, blue cheese crumbles, sauteed onions & bell peppers
17.95 $ 
BBQ Bacon & Cheddar Cheesesteak

Shaved ribeye, tangy KY bourbon BBQ, crispy bacon grilled onions, sharp cheddar cheese
18.95 $ 
Veggie "Burger"

Grilled portobello, roasted red pepper sauce, pepper Jack cheese, lettuce, tomato, pickled red onions
13.95 $

Kids meals are for children 11 and under. Please inform your server of any food allergies.

Locally Owned & Operated

Weekly Dine In Specials

– 25% Off Wings After 5 Pm*
MONDAYS 
– 25% Off Burgers & $3 Beer after 6p*
Wednesdays 
Team Trivia Night @7 Pm
Thursdays - 
– Kids Meals Combos- All $5*
Fridays Local Delivery & Online Ordering Now Available "The Range" Menu 
Coming Soon

Happy Hour Priced Bites & Beverages

Choose 3 flavors

Wing Buckets

Carolina Reaper***

S. Carolina’s own reaper pepper flavored wing. Hottest in SC
***waiver required***

South Carolina Gold

Golden BBQ, sweet & tangy

TX Mesquite BBQ

Smoky & sweet with a kick

Louisiana Cajun

MD Old Bay Style

KY Bourbon

*Make It Hot + 1.00 $

Medium or hot. traditional anchor bar style

Garlic Romano

Classic Lemon Pepper

Zesty & sweet with just the right amount of sour

Impossible Burger

Add to Any Salad
